creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: two-sided standing screen; recto: two male figures in partial armor wrestling; male figure lying on back is pulling at the armor near the thigh of standing male figure; verso: green basket full of shells; blossoming cherry branch across basket; bright red rose behind basket at L

medium: Ink, color, and gold on silk
title: Armor-tugging
